chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
Dear Sirs and Madams, we received this iPhone. It was sold to us under the category 'very good condition'. In our opinion, it has some signs of wear, so it corresponds to a good condition but not very good condition. We have also ordered an iPhone in the past that was in a very good condition. No real signs of wear. Top. So we had hoped for this price as well.
Pictures are attached.
Best regards
Schnödewind

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded €40 to the customer for grade discrepancy.


Kind regards, Tania from Back Market
